metadata.name: River Way Down
metadata.description:
"River Way Down" is about being at the point of no return with my music career. I've made the life decisions that I've made, and now I'm moving forward with full force because there are no other options. In other words, the ship has sailed, I took the River Way Down, and now there's no looking back. As the intro sample suggests, I don't see making music or being a good musician as a "goal" anymore - it's just what I do.

Sonically, the track juxtaposes a powerfully sang hook against aggressive bars. The two-and-a-half minute song comes to a glorious crescendo driven by an electric bass line that builds up speed as the second hook approaches.

The song is produced, written, mixed and mastered by yours truly. I even played my bass guitar on the track and shot and edited the artwork. My friend, Nick, read the quote at the start.
